name: Orbital Wars (itch)
description:
Orbital Wars

Instructions:

Up/Right/Down/Left Arrows - Move

Z - Button A

X - Button B

A - Start Button

A game by :

Ariel Coppes - @arielsan

Franco Zucchi - @pencilwing

Orbital Wars is a tribute to Gameboy, Advance Wars and Iron Marines and it was made to participate to the GBJAM7
